StratmasClient.communication
Class RegionData

java.lang.Object
  StratmasClient.communication.RegionData

public class RegionData
extends Object

Class used when subscribing to aggregated pv values over a Region.

Constructor Summary

          Constructs a RegionData object for the specified shape.

getPV

public Double getPV(String pvName,
                    String factionName)
Gets a copy of the specified pv for the specified faction. Returns null if the specified pv or the specified faction does not exist.

Parameters:
pvName - The name of the pv.
factionName - The name of the faction.
Returns:
A copy of the specified pv for the specified faction.
